description: Ryan Driller is obsessed with Marilyn Monroe. He eats sleeps and dreams of the scent of her perfect cherry red toes. He's so obsessed to the point of delusion that he's seeing three of her! Three curvy and devastatingly sexy Marilyn's seducing him with their high arches slid into satiny cream peep toe stilettos. He must worship each of their high arches, 30 toes, and round heels until the entire room smells of pheromones and all they can do is fuck! It's a mess of soft fleshy legs, sweaty sweet feet, licking, sucking, ass worship, lesbian foot play, fucking, anal sex and a 6 foot foot job!
title: Six Feet Of Marilyn
